title: Reports of certain cases arising in the severall courts of record at Westminster in the raignes of Q. Elizabeth, K. James, and the late King Charles with the resolutions of the judges of the said courts upon debate and solemn arguments / collected by very good hands, and lately re-viewed, examined, and approved by Justice Godbolt ; and now published by W. Hughes.
author: Godbolt, John, d. 1648.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and Gabriell Bedell,
